The join form hasn't been working for the last few days, and I 
finally realized that (since no one told me untill today, when I got 
like four emails and 20 IMs about it!), and fixed it. It works fine 
now.

PS. Firefox asked me to tell everyone that hotmail isn't letting her 
log in. She'll post as soon as she can.

I'm off to sleep now. Goodnight everyone.
